DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : The objective study delineate measure symptom burden experience patient ovarian cancer . The Primary Aim develop validate ovarian-cancer module M. D. Anderson Symptom Inventory ( MDASI-Ovarian Cancer ) measure severity multiple symptom impact symptom daily function patient ovarian cancer . The Secondary Aims : To develop detailed description symptom severity interference daily activity experience patient ovarian cancer ; To assess impact symptom severity standard function quality life ( QOL ) measure , include Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status ( ECOG PS ) , Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy-Ovary ( FACT-O ) , single-item QOL scale , patient ovarian cancer ; To define qualitative symptom burden patient ovarian cancer receive various treatment .
DOC.brief_title: M. D. Anderson Symptom Inventory - Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PART 1 : Interview : If agree take part study , interview like ovarian cancer symptom may experience . This 1-on-1 interview study doctor member study staff . It take place 1 regularly schedule , standard care clinic visit take 30 minute complete . The interview digitally record . The electronic recording interview give code number store password-protected computer M. D. Anderson . No identify information directly link interview record . Only researcher charge computer access code number able link interview recording . Questionnaires : After interview , also complete symptom questionnaire , quality-of-life questionnaire , demographic questionnaire ask question age , race , marital status . You complete questionnaire interview clinic visit . It take 10 minute complete 3 questionnaire . You contact study doctor study nurse right away time experience severe , troublesome , intolerable symptom . You also remember rate symptom questionnaire . The questionnaire also give code number store lock file cabinet MD Anderson . No identify information directly link questionnaire . Only researcher charge study access code number able link questionnaire . Length Study : After complete interview questionnaire , participation study . Additional Information : Any information symptom collect part study research purpose . All study material , include interview recording questionnaire , use purpose study destroy study result report . If rate symptom severe symptom questionnaire , study staff member ask already tell , plan tell regular care doctor nurse symptom . If already tell regular care doctor nurse , study staff member tell regular care doctor nurse symptom . This investigational study . Up 15 participant take part study . All enrol MD Anderson . PART 2 : Questionnaires : If agree take part study , complete following : 1 . A symptom questionnaire , 2 quality-of-life questionnaire , demographic questionnaire ask question age , race , marital status . It take 20 minute complete 4 questionnaire . 2 . About 1 5 day complete first set questionnaire , ask complete questionnaire either phone interview study staff mail-in survey . If complete questionnaire mail-in survey , study staff give copy questionnaire stamp pre-addressed envelope . The questionnaire take 5-10 minute complete . You contact study doctor study nurse right away time experience severe , troublesome , intolerable symptom . You also remember rate symptom questionnaire . The questionnaire give code number store lock file cabinet M. D. Anderson . No identify information directly link questionnaire . Only researcher charge study access code number able link questionnaire . Opinion Questionnaire : If one first 20 patient enrol study , ask question opinion symptom questionnaire . For example , ask symptom questionnaire easy understand complete , question include . The study staff use opinion decide change make questionnaire important symptom question miss questionnaire . This questionnaire take 5 minute complete . Length Study : After complete questionnaire , participation study . Additional Information : Any information symptom collect part study research purpose . The questionnaire use purpose study destroy study result report . If rate symptom severe symptom questionnaire , study staff member ask already tell , plan tell regular care doctor nurse symptom . If already tell regular care doctor nurse , study staff member tell regular care doctor nurse symptom . This investigational study . Up 128 participant take part study . All enrol MD Anderson Lyndon B. Johnson General Hospital .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female patient 18 year age old . 2 . Able speak read English . 3 . Having diagnosis high grade invasive epithelial ovarian cancer , peritoneal cancer fallopian tube cancer confirm pathological analysis . 4 . Being follow M D Anderson Cancer Center Lyndon B. Johnson General Hospital ( LBJ Hospital ) . 5 . Has consent participate . 6 . Has receive current cancer treatment prior chemotherapy last 30 day ( phase 2 subset 40 patient ) 1 ) Having medical condition impair performance status would preclude participation study .
